name: Italian Community Services
description: Italian Community Services is focused on preserving our culture, providing trusted services and resources ensuring we all thrive. Guided by family, community, education, and goodwill values, we help members of our community, young and old, celebrate their heritage and lead fulfilling, prosperous lives. Services offered: - Educational Grants and Scholarships - Youth Programs - Senior Activities - Community and Cultural Events - Care Packages - Resources and Referrals
